医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
在无排卵周期期间，月经痉挛可能会更严重且持续时间更长根据目前的了解，月经来潮仅发生在排卵周期或排卵周期中。但不列颠哥伦比亚大学 (UBC) 的新研究正在挑战这一观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Menstrual-cramps-can-be-more-severe-and-last-longer-during-anovulatory-cycles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Menstrual-cramps-can-be-more-severe-and-last-longer-during-anovulatory-cycles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=145e4b68-b047-4fc6-a6d1-9223f42044e5 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 23:17:39 -0400 Menstrual cramps can be more severe and last longer during anovulatory cycles
创新技术加速候选抗菌药物的搜索一种无需费力纯化步骤即可筛选多种候选药物的方法可以推进对抗耐药细菌的斗争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Innovative-technique-speeds-up-search-for-antimicrobial-drug-candidates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Innovative-technique-speeds-up-search-for-antimicrobial-drug-candidates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79fcbb06-6fc8-467e-8a52-cb77afed959e Thu, 11 Jul 2024 23:08:56 -0400 Innovative technique speeds up search for antimicrobial drug candidates
开发出利用人工智能分析心脏 MRI 扫描的突破性方法研究人员开发了一种借助人工智能分析心脏 MRI 扫描的突破性方法，这可以节省宝贵的 NHS 时间和资源，并改善对患者的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Groundwriting-method-development-for-analyzing-heart-MRI-scans-with-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Groundwriting-method-development-for-analyzing-heart-MRI-scans-with-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=616541cc-aed9-4a53-83a0-7d49a858072b Thu, 11 Jul 2024 22:48:00 -0400 Groundbreaking method developed for analyzing heart MRI scans with AI
研究显示不育男性面临严重焦虑《BMC 公共卫生》发表的研究表明，不育男性中焦虑症状的患病率很高，强调了不育治疗中综合心理支持的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Infertile-men-face-significant-anxiety-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Infertile-men-face-significant-anxiety-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=977f6ae2-e0d0-4852-a055-10d9fe87fc6a Thu, 11 Jul 2024 22:41:00 -0400 Infertile men face significant anxiety, study shows
研究揭示了孕妇长期感染新冠病毒的风险《妇产科》7 月 11 日发表的一份报告发现，在怀孕期间感染新冠病毒的人中，近十分之一的人会继续发展为长期新冠病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Study-uncovers-long-COVID-risks-for-pregnant-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Study-uncovers-long-COVID-risks-for-pregnant-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1659ccd1-9dde-4093-b620-d64d6aa71b5c Thu, 11 Jul 2024 22:38:55 -0400 Study uncovers long COVID risks for pregnant individuals
脂蛋白如何塑造您的代谢健康研究全面回顾了脂蛋白途径及其对健康代谢的影响，强调了 HDL、LDL 和其他脂蛋白在心血管健康和疾病中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/How-lipo Proteins-shape-your-metabolic-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/How-lipo Proteins-shape-your-metabolic-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=719140e6-0276-4182-94db-e100501e9be5 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 22:32:00 -0400 How lipoproteins shape your metabolic health
新型纳米传感器记录脊髓神经元的电活动植入技术显着提高了我们研究甚至调节大脑神经元活动的能力，但脊髓神经元的活动却很难研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/New-nanosized-sensor-records-the-electrical-activity-of-spinal-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/New-nanosized-sensor-records-the-electrical-activity-of-spinal-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b2fbc3-5b4b-4cf1-9782-cb664d725da2 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 22:23:00 -0400 New nanosized sensor records the electrical activity of spinal neurons
CD22靶向CAR-T疗法在复发性大B细胞淋巴瘤中显示出有希望的结果CAR-T 细胞疗法以癌细胞表面的特定蛋白质为目标，可使大约一半的大 B 细胞淋巴瘤患者的肿瘤缩小或消失，而这些患者在化疗后尚未出现好转。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/CD22-targeted-CAR-T-therapy-shows-promising-results-in-relapsed-large-B-cell-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/CD22-targeted-CAR-T-therapy-shows-promising-results-in-relapsed-large-B-cell-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d689b27-80d8-4700-82d3-2f7b78d7e0b9 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:40:35 -0400 CD22-targeted CAR-T therapy shows promising results in relapsed large B-cell lymphoma
通过纳米颗粒免疫优化流感疫苗策略佐治亚州立大学生物医学科学研究所的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，为了提供针对多种流感病毒变种的交叉保护，纳米颗粒疫苗可以产生关键的细胞和粘膜免疫反应，从而增强疫苗功效并扩大保护范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Optimizing-influenza-vaccine-strategies-with-nanoarticle-immunization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Optimizing-influenza-vaccine-strategies-with-nanoarticle-immunization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9387fa1-78a4-4344-a490-1ffde4c4715b Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:36:20 -0400 Optimizing influenza vaccine strategies with nanoparticle immunization
Prime编辑为囊性纤维化的永久治疗提供了有希望的途径囊性纤维化是最常见的遗传性疾病之一，会导致肺部和身体其他部位出现浓稠粘液积聚、呼吸问题和感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Prime-editing-offers-promising-path-to-permanent-treatment-for-cystic-chemistry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Prime-editing-offers-promising-path-to-permanent-treatment-for-cystic-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f012f90-83c5-47fe-9e27-e4f6e963d7f9 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:27:14 -0400 Prime editing offers promising path to permanent treatment for cystic fibrosis
